Package org.truta193.whmanager.pt2024_30221_truta_andrei_assignment_3.dataaccess.dao

Class BillDao

java.lang.Object
org.truta193.whmanager.pt2024_30221_truta_andrei_assignment_3.dataaccess.dao.BillDao
public class BillDao extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling CRUD operations related to Bill entities in the database.

    • getBillById

      public Bill getBillById(int id)
      Retrieves a Bill entity from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Bill entity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Bill object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getAllBills

      public List<Bill> getAllBills()
      Retrieves all Bill entities from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Bill objects stored in the database.
